article:
I cannot describe my excitement when I saw the famous general Arthur Scoresby covered with medals at a party given to honor him.However,there was a  _  look in the eyes of an old friend of mine who sat
next to me.He leaned toward me and whispered--"  _  --he is a fool and yet a lucky dog."This came as a  _  to me.Then he told me the whole story:
"Years ago.I was all instructor in the military school at Woolwich when young Scoresby was given his first  _  .Everybody answered the questions well  _  he did
not know anything.I felt sympathy and questioned him just  _  I thought he knew.He got through the examination.I thought that what in the end would  _  him would be the mathematics examination.Well.try to imagine the  _  .By some strange yet  _  accident,he took first prize! I never dreamed it would  lead to  such strange, laughable results.
Then,the Crimean War broke out.He was appointed an officer.But  _  knew
the secret.They saw his stupid mistakes as works of great  _  .And every mistake he made increased his glory and fame.
The battle grew hotter.The English army were steadily retreating all over the field.Our regimen t   _  an extremely important position.One mistake now would bring total  _  .An order came for him to fall back and support our
right.  _  .he moved forward and went over the hill to the left.A large and  _  Russian army was waiting there! The
surprised Russians thought that no single regiment by itself would  come around  there at such a time and that it must be tile whole British army.They fled in wild  _  .The British turned defeat into a sweeping and shining  _  .Scoresby became famous that day as a great military  _  honored throughout the world."
